articles.description: The Indianapolis Colts today released their final injury report for week 11 of the NFL season.    The final injury report for #GBvsIND. pic.twitter.com/rCVtaKPqll— Indianapolis Colts (@Colts) N...
articles.content:
The Indianapolis Colts today released their final injury report for week 11 of the NFL season. 
Defensive end Denico Autry has been placed on the reserve/COVID-19 list and is ruled OUT for Sundays g… [+1919 chars]
